clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in mediastinal lymph nodes with SUVmax 9.39.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in mediastinal lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Focal uptake in mediastinal lymph nodes consistent with post-surgical changes.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
